title: "Artifact’s AI Will Rewrite Clickbaity Headlines, Though Don’t You Dare Rework Mine"
excerpt: "On Friday, the AI-driven article recommendation app said it would let news hounds use an AI based on OpenAI’s GPT-4 large language model to rewrite a crappy “You’ll Never Believe What Happened Next” headline into something far more legible and indicative of the information in the article."
